content:
The reasons why someone would want to become an eod technician can vary. some people are drawn to the challenge and excitement of dealing with high-risk situations. others may have a desire to serve their country and make a difference in the world. for many, becoming an eod technician is a calling that they feel deeply, and they are driven by a sense of purpose to help others and contribute to their community.

additionally, many eod technicians are motivated by a sense of duty and responsibility. they feel that it's their duty to protect others and to put their skills and knowledge to use in the service of their country. eod technicians are highly trained professionals who take pride in their work and strive to make the world a safer place for everyone.
